description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Thrilling football back at Kai Tak
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 熾熱足球賽事再臨啟德

2025-10-14T12:30:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that AFC Asian Cup Qualifiers will be playing at Kai Tak Sports Park in the evening of 14 October. Passengers can access the venue from either Kai Tak or Sung Wong Toi stations. After the event, the train frequency will be enhanced as necessary.
2025-10-14T12:30:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 亞洲足協亞洲盃外圍賽於10月14日晚上於啟德園區作賽。前往觀賞的乘客可使用啟德或宋皇臺站。 散場時，港鐵公司會按需要加密列車班次。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) runs additional train trips
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 高速鐵路(香港段)加開臨時列車服務

2025-10-16T20:21:00.CONTENT_EN: As informed by the Chinese Mainland Railway Authorities, High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) will add the following temporary train trips: From Guangzhounan Station to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station • 24 Oct: G9533 From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Shenzhenbei Station • 26 Oct: G9534 Tickets are available for purchase through the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app; appointed travel agents; or at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. For train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app.
2025-10-16T20:21:00.CONTENT_CN: 中國內地鐵路部門通知，高速鐵路（香港段）將加開以下臨時列車車次： 由廣州南站前往香港西九龍站 •10月24日：G9533 由香港西九龍站前往深圳北站 •10月26日：G9534 乘客可透過12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式、指定代理或前往香港西九龍站購買列車車票。  有關列車服務詳情，請瀏覽12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式。
